text.en: Illusory manifestation of the wisdom of victors, past, present and future,
text.en-trans: dü sum gyalwé yeshe gyumé trul

text.en: Mighty tamer of demonic forces, Vajra Mahākāla,
Appearing here and now as my sole protector, Lord of Dharma—
text.en-trans: dengdir dak gi gön chik chö kyi jé

text.en: Ngawang Lekpa, at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: ngawang lekpé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: May any thought that conceives of some fault
In the lifestyle or activity of the noble guru never arise.
text.en-trans: kyön du dzinpé tokpa mi kyé zhing

text.en: May I see whatever he does in a positive light, and
text.en-trans: chi dzé lekpar tongwé mögü kyi

text.en: Through such devotion, may his blessings infuse my mind.
text.en-trans: jinlab sem la jukpar jingyi lob

text.en: Through the power and blessings of the gurus, Three Jewels and deities,
text.en-trans: lama chok sum lha yi jin tu dang

text.en: And the mighty strength of an ocean of oath-bound dharma guardians,
May the life of this glorious protector guru remain secure,
And may his enlightened activity flourish and spread.
text.en-trans: trinlé dar zhing gyepar dzé du sol
